content:
Hi everyone. Sorry I've been a bit absent. Been busy with MH stuff mostly...
Anyway. I was wondering what does your config.toml look like for when you're working on mir-opts. I have never really modified it, and I bet I'm missing on some good stuff (like debug info, better incremental compilation or just faster compile times)
For example I was wondering if I should set [llvm] > optimize to false and [build] > verbose to 2
